accountCreatedMsg: An account has been created for you.
anonymousUserDefaultMessage: Please login or email someone@yoursite.com to get a user account.
anonymousUserDesc: Anonymous users can use the script but have limited access: they cannot save, link to their data sets or generate more than 100 rows at a time.
anonymousUserMessage: Message to display to anonymous users when trying to save:
confirmDeleteForm: 本当にフォームを削除してもよろしいですか？
confirmDeleteUserAccount: Are you sure you want to delete this user account?
confirmEmptyForm: 本当にフォームをクリアしてもよろしいですか？
dataSetHelp: This is where you define exactly what kind of data you want to generate. Try filling in a row or two and click the Generate button. Youll get the hang of it pretty fast.
developerIntro: The following sections lets you fine-tune what you see in your javascript console for development purposes.
emailNotSent: We were unable to send the email notification.
emailUserLoginInfo: Email the user their login information
enterEmailAddressToResetPassword: Enter your email address below to reset your password.
enterUserAccountDetails: Please enter your user account details below.
exportTypeValidateError: Ack! There was an error in the Export Types validate() function. Sorry, we cant proceed - call a developer!
formExistsOverwriteConfirmation: This form already exists. Do you want to overwrite it?
formNotDeleted: Sorry, we couldn't delete this form. Re-log in and try again.
helpIntro: The installation script does two things for you. One, it automatically generates a settings.php file which contains your unique database connection info, so that it knows how to connect to the database whenever you visit the script. Two, it populates the database with various information that it needs: things like general settings, user accounts and raw data like peoples names, country and city names.
helpPrereqInfo: Just like virtually every other PHP/MySQL script out there, you need to have already created a database before running the installation script. The installation script doesnt create the database, it just tries to connect to it to create the tables. If youre not sure how to create a database within your environment, youll either need to contact your hosting provider, or spend some time researching it on Google. Sorry!
installationCompleteText: The Data Generator has been successfully installed! Click the button below to go to the script.
installationFailedCreateSettingsFile: The script was unable to create your settings.php file.
installationFailedCreateSettingsFileMsg: This usually occurs when it fails to have permissions to write to the folder. Please manually create this file and place it in the base folder of the Data Generator. When you have done this, button below to continue installing.
installationIntro: Alrighty, lets get this sucker installed. Enter your database information to create your database tables. If youre unsure about any of these fields, click on the Help tab for a little more info.
installationPluginIntro: Almost done! Now were going to install the plugins: these are what make the Data Generator actually useful - i.e. the type of data you can generate (Data Types), the format of the generated data (Export Types) and all the Country-specific data like regions and cities.
installationStep2Intro: So far so good! Now click the button below to create your settings.php file. This file is stored in the root folder of this application and is the only place (other than the database) that stores custom information about your installation.
installationStep3Intro: You have three choices for the way your installation handles user accounts.
invalidAccountId: The Account ID is not valid.
invalidNumResults: Please enter a valid number of results.
invalidPassword: Sorry, that password is not correct. Please try again.
invalidTableNames: Database column names can only alphanumeric characters and must begin with a letter. Please fix the following rows:
makeDataSetPublicAgreement: I understand that to share this Data Set, I need to make it public.
metaDescription: GenerateData.com: free, GNU-licensed, random custom data generator for testing software
metaKeywords: Random Data, Test Data, Sample Data, data generator, generate data
missingNodeNames: The following rows have missing node names:
missingTableNames: The following rows have missing table column names:
noData: Oops, nothing to generate! Enter some data to be generated.
noJs: Please enable javascript in your browser.
noJsBlurb: You know this is, like, the 21st century? The Data Generator script relies heavily on javascript - things just plain wont work without it. You'll need to enable it in your browser then refresh this page.
noNumRows: Please enter the number of rows to add.
noSavedDataSets: You dont have any saved data sets.
numRowsTooLarge: Sorry, youre limited to generating %1 rows at a time. Click generate to continue.
passwordChangeNote: You only need to fill the password fields in if you want to change it.
passwordResetComplete: Your password has been reset and you have been emailed the new password.
passwordResetEmailContent1: Your password has been reset. You may use the following password to log in: %1
passwordResetEmailContent2: Please change it once youve logged in.
pleaseFixErrors: Please fix the following errors and resubmit:
pluginsIntro: Any time you add or remove a plugin, you need to reset the plugins. This will update the database and ensure you can access the plugins you require.
resetPluginsWithBundling: You have bundling/minification enabled. After clicking this button you will need to run grunt to recreate the bundles. For more information read this documentation page. If you have any problems, you may want to turn off bundling.
saveDataSetToLink: De-nied. In order to share this Data Set with other people, you need to save it first.
scriptThinking: Oops, hold on for a second. The script is thinking.
settingsFileExists: The settings file already exists. For new installations, the settings.php shouldnt exist. Either delete it and continue the installation script or try loading the script again with the existing settings file values.
tipCountryData:
This section lets you control what country-specific data should be included in your generated data sets. The values you select here affect certain Data Types that you may select, such as Region, Postal/Zip and Country.

To give you a better idea of what this means, try selecting the Region Data Type for one of your rows in the Data Set section, then add / remove countries from the Country-Specific Data section. Youll see that the row options that appear are directly affected by the countries you have selected: you can only ever generate a subset of the countries selected.
title: generatedata.com
userAccountSectionIntro: This section lets you create any number of users accounts to allow people access to the script. Only you are able to create or delete accounts.
userNotFound: Sorry, we were unable to identify you.
validationAccountAlreadyExists: Sorry, an account with that email address already exists.
validationInvalidChars: Alphanumeric and underscore characters only, please.
validationInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
validationInvalidPermissions: You dont have permissions to do this.
validationNotLoggedIn: You dont appear to be logged in. Please try logging in again.
cannotChangeNumRows: 申し訳ありませんが、生成される行数を変更することはできません。
